entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
